name: Sora
description: After abusing the Power of Waking to save his friends and defeat Xehanort, he is confronted by an enigmatic figure named Yozora on top of a building, surrounded by countless skyscrappers. Shortly after, he awakens calmly in an apartment, greeted by Strelitzia, who lets him know that he is now in Quadratum, a world unlike any other he has been before. With her help, Sora will get used to this new place but shortly after he must face an enormous heartless that is threatening the whole city and its inhabitants.

name: Riku
description: After finding out about Sora's dissapearance, Riku gets heavily involved into finding him while the others embark on their own important missions. A year later, Riku gets a valuable clue from Kairi and her memories. With assistance from the Fairy Godmother, Riku makes contact with the Nameless Star, a girl from the other side who guides him to Quadratum, where Sora is waiting to be found. Determined, Riku gets ready and uses the Power of Waking to reach this unknown world.

name: Strelitzia
description: A girl from the age of Fairytales. Strelitzia is a Keyblade wielder and union leader like her older brother Lauriam. After getting involved in an infamous incident, she is transported to Quadratum, or like she calls it sometimes, the Afterworld. Strelitzia finds Sora and brings him to her apartment, where he sleeps for seven days. Kind and supportive, she becomes a helpful ally who will help Sora to settle down in this new and foreign setting.

name: Yozora
description: Everything surrounding him is a mistery. A powerful rival from Quadratum who appears before Sora in the Final World. He claims that he went through some trials and his appearance doesn't represent how he truly looks like. After finding out the boy before him is Sora and because he was told to do so, he fights Sora with his reliable weapons, a crossbow and a sword and powers that Sora has never seen before. In his world, he is known as the Commander.

name: The Foretellers
description: Five powerful keyblade wielders from the age of Fairytales. It is unknown how Invi, Ira, Gula and Aced traveled forward to the present, only that they came to fullfill a mission assigned to them by the Master of Masters. How this is connected to Sora is something that has yet to be discovered. Ava, the last foreteller, was assigned a whole different mission. Her whereabouts are currently unknown.

name: Sigurd & Master of Masters
description: Not so much is known about Sigurd, only that he comes from the past, from when the city of Scala ad Caelum was founded. On the other hand, the Master of Masters is a eccentric keyblade master that trained the five Foretellers and gave them the book of profecies, written thanks to the Gazing Eye, allowing him to see the future. Even if he firmly stands against the darkness, the Master's antics will surely put Sora and his allies in difficult situations.
